snippet: DAVIDSON--Ann (Soper), 85, April 12, 2016 in Concord, MA. Beloved wife of the late Harold S. Davidson. Daughter of the late Ellis Clarke Soper and Ruth (Turner) Soper. www.deefuneralhome.com. 1/3
